title: Clean energy will be critical to winning the AI race with China

titles: Clean energy will be critical to winning the AI race with China
summary: The US is urged to expedite the development of a diverse energy portfolio to satisfy demand. This approach emphasizes the importance of not relying on a single energy source but instead fostering an environment that supports a variety of energy sources to ensure a stable and sufficient supply.
constructiveness_reason: This story is constructive as it not only highlights the importance of diversifying energy sources for the US but also suggests a solution to the problem. It empowers readers with the knowledge of the role clean energy can play in the AI race with China.
